user.title: iNELS MQTT broker
user.description: Please enter the MQTT broker details to connect iNELS components.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of the MQTT broker.
data_description.port: The port number on which the MQTT broker is running.
data_description.username: The username for authenticating with the MQTT broker.
data_description.password: The password for authenticating with the MQTT broker.
data_description.transport: The transport protocol to use for MQTT communication (TCP or WebSocket).
